We’re a community of creatives, entrepreneurs, and activists with a passion to connect with God and one another to the next level that Jesus modeled and made possible.

Jay Denison Pastor

Jay Denison is the co-founder of Second Sunday and a veteran of creating communities, spaces, and experiences that connect people with God. For 20 years, he has served in various spiritual and secular contexts as a producer, music director, and teacher. Jay’s vision is to build bridges between spirituality and culture.

Ing Denison Pastor

Ingvild Denison is the co-founder of Second Sunday and co-owner of Cultivate Counseling Collective. For 20 years, Ing has helped couples connect more with one another, their community, and God.

Join us

Connect with us online through live worship, daily readings and the Second Sunday app.

Get the app

Weekly meetups, prayer support, a running club... It’s all on the Second Sunday app.
